title: Relative Motion
description: Schema describing the relative motion of an object from the perspective of a reference frame.

objectId.description: Unique identifier of the object in motion.

referenceFrameId.description: Unique identifier of the reference frame.

objectVelocity.description: Velocity vector of the object in a global frame (m/s).

referenceFrameVelocity.description: Velocity vector of the reference frame (m/s).

relativeVelocity.description: Velocity of the object relative to the reference frame (calculated as objectVelocity - referenceFrameVelocity).

time.description: Time instant for the relative motion measurement (seconds).
